info.name: Chicago Tribune: fewer nuisances for casual users
info.description:
Removes items that are nuisances for drive-by "not-my-city, not-a-subscriber" readers from Tribune properties - "Promoted stories", "Share" links, advertising, subscriber-only controls, "Premium Content" teaser links and other self-promotion, "Start Trial" and "Subscribe" nags.

Optionally shrinks the useless lede photo and restores it on hover.
info.additionalInfo:
Other Tribune newspapers styled by this theme:
  • Baltimore Sun (Baltimore, Maryland)
  • Baltimore City Paper (Baltimore, Maryland)
  • Capital Gazette (Annapolis, Maryland) including the Maryland Gazette, the Bowie [MD] Blade-News, and the Crofton-West County [MD] Gazette
  • Carroll County Times (Westminster, Maryland)
  • Chicago Tribune including the Chicago Daily Southtown, the Gary [IN] Post-Tribune, the Aurora, IL Beacon-News, the Elgin, IL Courier-News, the Naperville [IL] Sun, the Lake County [IL] News-Sun
  • LA Times including the Burbank Leader, the Laguna Beach Coastline Pilot, the Newport Beach Daily Pilot, the Huntington Beach Independent, the Glendale News Press, the Pasadena Sun, the La Ca√±ada Valley Sun, KTLA, and Hoy
  • The Hartford Courant (Hartford, Connecticut)
  • Sun-Sentinel (Fort Lauderdale, Florida)
  • Orlando Sentinel (Orlando, Florida)
  • The Morning Call (Allentown, Pennsylvania)
  • Daily Press (Newport News, Virginia)
  • The Virginia Gazette (Williamsburg, Virginia)
